sys_properties.name: x_snc_slackerbot.privacy.notice
sys_properties.value:
*SlackerBot Privacy Notice* This privacy notice relates to the information being processed when interacting with SlackerBot. You can also review the Slack general privacy at https://slack.com/trust/privacy/privacy-policy
*SlackerBot* currently collects and processes the following information for every message you post to this channel, including replies to threads and reactions: :point_right: Slack Team ID :point_right: Slack Channel ID :point_right: Slack User ID :point_right: Slack User Name :point_right: Message timestamp :point_right: Message text :point_right: Reaction(s)
*How we get the personal information and why we have it* Most of the personal information we process is provided to us directly by you for one of the following reasons: :point_right: You posted a message or replied to a message within any channel where SlackerBot is installed
*We use the information that you have given us in order to* :point_right: Parse the message and respond according to the SlackerBot desired process (known as Parsers). Use `!help` for more information on Parsers
*We may share the information we collect with ServiceNow*
*Under the UK & EU General Data Protection Regulation (UK/EU GDPR), the lawful bases we rely on for processing this information are:* :point_right: We need it to perform a public task.
*How we store your personal information* :point_right: Your information is securely stored on ServiceNow in US Data Centres. :point_right: We keep each chat record for 7 days. We will then dispose your information automatically.
*Your data protection rights* Under data protection law, you have rights including: :point_right: Your right of access - You have the right to ask us for copies of your personal information. :point_right: Your right to rectification - You have the right to ask us to rectify personal information you think is inaccurate. You also have the right to ask us to complete information you think is incomplete. :point_right: Your right to erasure - You have the right to ask us to erase your personal information in certain circumstances. :point_right: Your right to restriction of processing - You have the right to ask us to restrict the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances. :point_right: Your right to object to processing - You have the the right to object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances. :point_right: Your right to data portability - You have the right to ask that we transfer the personal information you gave us to another organisation, or to you, in certain circumstances. :point_right: You are not required to pay any charge for exercising your rights. If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. :point_right: Please contact us if you wish to make a request.

sys_update_version.name: sys_properties_7250d78797221110b29b7c80f053af74
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties">
    <sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <choices/>
        <description>This privacy notice tells the users what to expect us to do with their personal information, when SlackerBot is installed into any channel.

We’ll tell you:

why we are able to process your information;
what purpose we are processing it for;
whether you have to provide it to us;
how long we store it for;
whether there are other recipients of your personal information;
whether we intend to transfer it to another country; and
whether we do automated decision-making or profiling.</description>
        <ignore_cache>true</ignore_cache>
        <is_private>false</is_private>
        <name>x_snc_slackerbot.privacy.notice</name>
        <read_roles/>
        <suffix>privacy.notice</suffix>
        <sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-19 21:38:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7250d78797221110b29b7c80f053af74</sys_id>
        <sys_name>x_snc_slackerbot.privacy.notice</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="SlackerBot" source="x_snc_slackerbot">b02cf9e61b861d10d806dc23b24bcb3f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="SlackerBot">b02cf9e61b861d10d806dc23b24bcb3f</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_properties_7250d78797221110b29b7c80f053af74</sys_update_name>
        <type>string</type>
        <value>*SlackerBot Privacy Notice*
This privacy notice relates to the information being processed when interacting with SlackerBot. You can also review the Slack general privacy at https://slack.com/trust/privacy/privacy-policy

*SlackerBot* currently collects and processes the following information for every message you post to this channel, including replies to threads and reactions:
:point_right: Slack Team ID
:point_right: Slack Channel ID
:point_right: Slack User ID
:point_right: Slack User Name
:point_right: Message timestamp
:point_right: Message text 
:point_right: Reaction(s)

*How we get the personal information and why we have it*
Most of the personal information we process is provided to us directly by you for one of the following reasons:
:point_right: You posted a message or replied to a message within any channel where SlackerBot is installed

*We use the information that you have given us in order to*
:point_right: Parse the message and respond according to the SlackerBot desired process (known as Parsers). Use `!help` for more information on Parsers

*We may share the information we collect with ServiceNow*

*Under the UK & EU General Data Protection Regulation (UK/EU GDPR), the lawful bases we rely on for processing this information are:*
 :point_right:  We need it to perform a public task.

*How we store your personal information*
:point_right: Your information is securely stored on ServiceNow in US Data Centres.
:point_right: We keep each chat record for 7 days. We will then dispose your information automatically.

*Your data protection rights*
Under data protection law, you have rights including:
:point_right: Your right of access - You have the right to ask us for copies of your personal information.
:point_right: Your right to rectification - You have the right to ask us to rectify personal information you think is inaccurate. You also have the right to ask us to complete information you think is incomplete.
:point_right: Your right to erasure - You have the right to ask us to erase your personal information in certain circumstances.
:point_right: Your right to restriction of processing - You have the right to ask us to restrict the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.
:point_right: Your right to object to processing - You have the the right to object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.
:point_right: Your right to data portability - You have the right to ask that we transfer the personal information you gave us to another organisation, or to you, in certain circumstances.
:point_right: You are not required to pay any charge for exercising your rights. If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you.
:point_right: Please contact us if you wish to make a request.</value>
        <write_roles/>
    </sys_properties>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7250d78797221110b29b7c80f053af74"/>
</record_update>
